member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.GradientBackground.Angle
member.summary: Sets the gradient angle when using the 'Angled' gradient background.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.GradientBackground.Colors
member.summary: Gets or sets the colors to be used for a gradient background.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.GradientBackground.ColorFrom
member.summary: Gets or sets the beginning color of a gradient.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.GradientBackground.EffectArea
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the percentage of chart area affected by a GradientBackground.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.GradientBackground.Factor
member.summary: Specifies the percentages of the starting color and the ending color to use at the corresponding position for two color gradients.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.GradientBackground.Position
member.summary: Allows you to specify positions along the gradient background to correspond with color and factor attributes.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.GradientBackground.Type
member.summary: Sets the style of the gradient for a selected gradient background.

member.name: M:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.GradientBackground.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Draws a Chart FX GradientBackground on a selected device context.
member.param: A Graphics object is associated with a specific device context.
A Rectangle object specifying the desired position and size of the gradient.
The external color for the gradient.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.ImageBackground.BackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color when an ImageBackground object uses a picture with transparency.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.ImageBackground.Image
member.summary: Gets or sets a image for the ImageBackground object.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.ImageBackground.Mode
member.summary: Gets or sets the rendering style for the image used as the ImageBackground.

member.name: M:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.ImageBackground.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Draws a Chart FX ImageBackground on a selected device context.
member.param: A Graphics object is associated with a specific device context.
A Rectangle object specifying the desired position and size of the border.
The external color for the Image Background.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.ImageBorder.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the border.

member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.ImageBorder.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type for the image border.

member.name: M:ChartFX.WinForms.Adornments.ImageBorder.Draw(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Draws a Chart FX ImageBorder on a selected device context.
member.param: A Graphics object is associated with a specific device context.
A Rectangle object specifying the desired position and size of the border.
